mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GROUP_CONTACT(ID, MEMBER_ID, STUDY_GROUP_ID) VALUES (GROUP_CONTACT_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{studyGroupId})
mapper.select: SELECT GC.ID ID, TO_CHAR(GC.REGDATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') REGDATE, M.NAME NAME, M.GENDER GENDER, M.AGE AGE FROM GROUP_CONTACT GC JOIN MEMBER M ON GC.MEMBER_ID = M.ID WHERE GC.STUDY_GROUP_ID = #{studyGroupId} AND GC.STATUS = 'hold' AND M.STATUS = 'enabled' ORDER BY GC.REGDATE
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GROUP_CONTACT WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{id} AND STUDY_GROUP_ID = #{studyGroupId}
